thread.title: VW reaches German deal on wages

title: VW reaches German deal on wages
text:
VW reaches German deal on wages 4:21pm GMT - 01:09 
Volkswagen has agreed to raise the wages of around 120,000 workers in Germany by 4.3 percent from May, resolving a dispute that had prompted its first strikes since 2004. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Volkswagen has agreed to raise the wages of around 120,000 workers in Germany by 4.3 percent from May, resolving a dispute that had prompted its first strikes since 2004. David Pollard reports.
